institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 7 (Operation of Deliberation Committee, etc.)
contents: Article 7 (Operation of Deliberation Committee, etc.) ① Pursuant to Article 9, Paragraph 1 of the Regulations, the Chairman of the Board shall undergo deliberation and resolution by the Deliberation Committee on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to the selection and cancellation of the joint training center, 2. Matters pertaining to the approval of the joint training center's business plan and approval of changes to the business plan. However, in the case of a change in the business plan without an increase in support funds, it may not go through deliberation and resolution by the Deliberation Committee. 3. Matters related to restrictions on support and extension of support period for the joint training center, 4. Matters related to decisions on support funds for the joint training center, 5. Matters related to the evaluation of the business results of the joint training center, 6. Other matters related to the consortium project by the chairman Matters submitted to the meeting as deemed necessary for the performance of ② The Deliberation Committee shall open with the attendance of a majority of the 15 or less deliberation members constituted for deliberation and shall make decisions with the approval of more than two-thirds of the members present. Revised September 10, 2021, ③ The deliberation committee shall conduct face-to-face deliberations in principle. However, if an infectious disease occurs or the chairman of the board determines that the agenda for deliberation and resolution is minor, the reason may be stated and a non-face-to-face meeting (written or video conference, etc.) may be held. Revised September 10, 2021, ④ If the chairperson is unable to attend due to unavoidable reasons, etc., the chairman may appoint a temporary chairperson from among the deliberation committee members. ⑤ The Chairman may appoint the head of the department in charge of the corporation's consortium business as the secretary of the deliberation committee. ⑥ The Corporation may pay allowances and travel expenses to members who attend the deliberation committee in accordance with Table 2, “Standards for payment of deliberation committee member allowances, etc.” within the budget. Revised September 10, 2021, ⑦ Matters not stipulated in these rules regarding the operation of the Deliberation Committee shall be subject to the “Standard Rules for Committee Operation” separately established by the Chairman.
